ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I think if you were a newbie and wanted to start out as a shadow knight, the dark elf is the perfect choice. One thing is, they are pretty common, from what I
ygData.messageBody:
I think if you were a newbie and wanted to start out as a shadow knight,
the dark elf is the perfect choice. One thing is, they are pretty common,
from what I see, even more so than Necromancers. There are ALWAYS Dark
Elves around, so it is easier to make friends and find alliances than the
other dark races. But there are those still who pursue anything that will
make your gameplay less enjoyable, so make your choices wisely.

Human Shadow Knights seem the be the rarest of the SKs around, or so that I
have seen. But this is one reason I enjoy playing it, the challenge, and
the fact there isnt much of my kind around.

goodluck

----------
> From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK
> Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 9:20 PM
>
> From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>
>
> Hello. I am getting a new computer in a week and the
> first thing I going to do is to buy EverQuest. I have
> my heart set on playing as a Dark Elf Shadow Knight
> because they're the coolest. I would like to know if
> this would be extremely different to do, especcially
> for a newbie. I do know a lot about the game though
> because my friend has it. If anyone wants to tell me
> anything about the dark elf sk please do so. I'll see
> you all on the Tunare server in about a week or so.
>
> Tekman (future Dark Elf Sk on Tunare)
